title: Lioness of Cygnus Five
description: In a Galaxy ruled by the regressive Kingdom, Bryant Jones's mission of medical advancements was seen as perverted. Now Jones is on his way to a Penal Colony on the far reaches of the systemâ€¦ a colony he never intends to reach.Once the Kingdom's war angel, Captain Aurora Campos has been humbled by scandal. Now a lowly prison transport commander, when her ship is shot down by the ancient alien defences of the penal planet, she will fight the world to win back her glory and keep her charges safe.Two destinies collide, slamming truth and faith together in an epic battle that may shatter the very core of The Kingdom itself.
author: Alex Beecroft
